title: A discourse of mans life Comparing him to things that quickly passe, as bubble, shuttle, blossome, streame, and grasse. To the tune of Ayme not too high.
notes: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Verse - "Now to discourse of man I take in hand,".
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
